text: kyf yuafiq allah lil'iiman bih wabirasulih qwmana jahaduu nbwt muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam baed 'iimanihim bh, washahiduu 'ana mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wasalam haqa wama ja' bih hu alhq, waja'ahum alhujaj min eind allah waldlayl bisihat dhlk? wallah la yuafiq lilhaqi walswab aljamaeat alzlmt, wahum aladhin eadaluu ean alhaqu 'iilaa albatl, fakhtaru alkufr ealaa al'iyman
